title: Co-Op
description:
The data being visualised here is the location of Co-op stores. The height of each pixel represents the distance to the closest Co-op store as the crow flies.

The location of the Co-op stores were scraped from the API that powers the Co-op Store Locator (https://www.coop.co.uk/store-finder). The API was last scraped for updates on 31st May 2021. For more information, the source code that created this dataset is here https://github.com/jamesHargreaves12/DataVis_python.
